TEXT.S: Qapedang i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Qapedang. u kasalumaluma' nu Qapedang sa, 308 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 1,146 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 1,119 ku tademaw, pakalatu 98%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 27 ku tademaw, pakalatu 2%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 94%, Bunun 1%, Amis 1%, zumazuma 1%.
